div.p: The code of the ADAMONT v1.0 method is available as an open git repository after free registration at https://opensource.cnrm-game-meteo.fr/projects/adamont. The version of the open source code of SURFEX/ISBA-Crocus used in this study is available as a specific branch of an open git repository, after free registration, at https://opensource.cnrm-game-meteo.fr/projects/surfex_git2.
